## ğŸ–¥ï¸ Terminal Setup

Configure your terminal for optimal AI development:

### [Ghostty Configuration](ghostty-setup.md)

Learn how to setup and customize Ghostty terminal with aiterm.

**What you'll learn:**

- Theme and font configuration
- Ghostty 1.2.x features (titlebar styles, background images)
- Profile management
- Backup and restore

**Time:** ~30 minutes

---

### [StatusLine Setup](statusline-setup.md)

Configure the Powerlevel10k-style status bar for Claude Code.

**What you'll learn:**

- Install StatusLine into Claude Code
- Customize themes and spacing
- Configure display options
- Use Ghostty progress bars

**Time:** ~20 minutes

---

## ğŸ”Œ Integration Tutorials

Connect aiterm with your tools:

### [Claude Code Integration](../../CLAUDE-CODE-TUTORIAL.md)

Master Claude Code auto-approvals and settings management.

**What you'll learn:**

- Setup auto-approval presets
- Manage permissions
- Backup and restore settings
- StatusLine integration

**Time:** ~15 minutes

---

### [Gemini CLI Workflow](../../gemini-cli/GEMINI_TUTORIAL.md)

Integrate aiterm with Google Gemini CLI.

**What you'll learn:**

- Gemini CLI setup
- ADHD-friendly prompting
- Workflow automation
- Context management

**Time:** ~25 minutes

## ğŸ“Š Interactive Learning

Try the built-in interactive tutorials:

```bash
# List available tutorials
ait learn list

# Start interactive tutorial
ait learn start

# Check your progress
ait learn progress
```
